bibl.title: The Greek Documentary Letter Tradition. Third century B.C.E. to Third Century C.E. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Study of the Greek non-literary letter tradition on the basis of several hundred letters written on papyrus.
bibl.seg: White John Lee, The Greek Documentary Letter Tradition. Third century B.C.E. to Third Century C.E. Avec résumé en anglais.
Study of the Greek non-literary letter tradition on the basis of several hundred letters written on papyrus.
